quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I trained myself to fight an army, so one guy will not defeat me.
author: Georges St-Pierre

quote: The problem is not the problem, the problem is your attitude about the problem.
author: Capt. Jack Sparrow

quote: I am the master of my fate; The captain of my soul.
author: William Ernest Henley

quote: A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
The only source of knowledge is experience.
You never fail until you stop trying.
Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Remember that just because you hit bottom doesnâ€™t mean you have to stay there.
author: Robert Downey Jr.

quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
If a man knows not to which port he sails, no wind is favorable.
It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
What need is there to weep over parts of life? The whole of it calls for tears.
He suffers more than necessary, who suffers before it is necessary.
Only time can heal what reason cannot.
Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
Fate leads the willing, and drags along the reluctant.
Eyes will not see when the heart wishes them to be blind.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be One.
Your task is to stand straight; not to be held straight.
The true worth of a man is to be measured by the objects he pursues.
author: Marcus Aurelius
